name: AEGIS Europe
membership: The Alliance is composed of European and national sectoral association members as well as companies from the manufacturing industry established in the European Union or a country of the European Economic Area. A register containing the list of members is kept at the office of the Alliance.
goal: AEGIS Europe brings together nearly 30 European associations representing a broad variety of industries including traditional industries, consumer branches, SMEs and renewable energy sectors, accounting for more than â‚¬500 billion in annual turnover and millions of jobs across the EU. This industry alliance, made up of leaders in sustainable manufacturing and social and environmental responsibility, is committed to European manufacturing as the fundamental driver of innovation, growth and jobs in Europe.
interests: Competition, Customs, Employment and Social Affairs, Enterprise, External Relations, Trade
euInitiatives: AEGIS Europe works on EU Commercial Policy (trade defence), WTO issues, Industrial Policy.
